channel.title: Presskits on Zeppelin Studio

item.title: Press Kit - Schein
item.description: Details Release Date: October 10, 2014 Genre: Puzzle Platformer Platforms: Steam, GOG, Humble Store, more… Developer: Zeppelin Studio Publisher: Meridian4 Press Contact: Savannah Sher (Meridian4) / Tiare Feuchtner (Zeppelin Studio) Website: scheingame.com Facebook: facebook.com/scheingame Twitter: twitter.com/scheingame Google+: google.com/+Scheingame YouTube: youtube.com/scheingame Schein Steam Release Short Description Use the magic of light to explore hidden worlds, solve challenging puzzles and defeat deadly beasts in award-winning Schein, possibly the trickiest platformer you’ll play all year.
